Package org.forgerock.openam.core

Class CoreServicesWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.core.CoreServicesWrapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreServicesWrapper
    public class CoreServicesWrapper
extends Object
    A wrapper class around core static class and methods. Providing a wrapper around these methods allows for easy decoupling and unit testing.

    • Constructor Summary

      • getServiceConfigManager

        public ServiceConfigManager getServiceConfigManager​(String serviceName,
                                                    SSOToken token)
                                             throws SSOException,
                                                    SMSException
        Gets a ServiceConfigManager instance.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The service name.
        token - The SSOToken.
        Returns:
        A ServiceConfigManager instance.
        Throws:
        SSOException - If there is a problem when creating the ServiceConfigManager instance.
        SMSException - If the SSO Token is invalid or expired.

        Parameters:
        value - The value.
        key - The key.
        Returns:
        If the value does or does not contain the key.

      • isOrganizationActive

        public boolean isOrganizationActive​(String realm)
                             throws IdRepoException,
                                    SSOException
        Checks to see if the Organization is active. IdUtils.isOrganizationActive(SSOToken, String)
        Parameters:
        realm - The organization DN to check the status of.
        Returns:
        True if organization is active, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        IdRepoException - If cannot find any information for organization.
        SSOException - If there is a problem with the admin SSOToken.

      • setLbCookie

        public void setLbCookie​(AuthContextLocal authContext,
                        jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                        jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                 throws AuthException
        Creates and sets the load balancer cookies on the response.
        Parameters:
        authContext - The AuthContextLocal object.
        request - The HttpServletRequest.
        response - The HttpServletResponse.
        Throws:
        AuthException - If there is a problem setting the load balancer cookies.

      • getIdentity

        public AMIdentity getIdentity​(String username,
                              String realm)
        Gets the AMIdentity of a user with username equal to username that exists in realm
        Parameters:
        username - username of the user to get.
        realm - realm the user belongs to.
        Returns:
        The AMIdentity of user with username equal to username.
